intro.title: Hello, I'm Jason Bourner
intro.subtitle: A Software Developer based in the UK
intro.description: I specialize in creating responsive and user-friendly web applications using modern technologies. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I bring designs to life and ensure seamless user experiences across all devices.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a passionate software developer with a knack for problem-solving and a love for coding. With experience in various programming languages and frameworks, I enjoy building applications that make a difference. When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring the outdoors or indulging in my love for photography.
